mapper.select: SELECT id, channel_name AS channelName, share_title AS shareTitle, share_image AS shareImage, share_content AS shareContent, url, receive_amount AS receiveAmount, `new_register` AS newRegister, `total_money` AS totalMoney, `new_buyer_money` AS newBuyerMoney, `is_send_msg` AS isSendMsg, `msg_content` AS msgContent, `is_available` AS isAvailable, `create_time` AS createTime FROM spread_channel WHERE id = #{channelId} AND is_available = 1

SELECT id, spread_channel_id AS spreadChannelId, coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_amount AS couponAmount, validity_date_type AS validityDateType, days, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM spread_channel_prize WHERE spread_channel_id=#{channelId}
mapper.update: UPDATE spread_channel SET receive_amount=receive_amount+1 WHERE id=#{channelId}
UPDATE spread_channel SET new_register=new_register+1 WHERE id=#{channelId}
mapper.select: SELECT t2.activity_id FROM register_mobile_coupon t1, relation_activity_and_received_mobile t2 WHERE t1.mobile_number = t2.mobile_number AND t1.coupon_id = t2.coupon_id AND t1.source_type=#{sourceType} AND t2.mobile_number = #{mobileNumber} AND t2.acitvity_type=#{acitvityType} ORDER BY t2.id LIMIT 1
